weakness.name: Undetected changes in security configurations
weakness.desc: Monitoring and alerting for security configurations are not configured and changes cannot be detected.

test.steps:
1. Go to "Monitor" and then to "Alerts".
  2. Check that there is any rule to alert when the Activity Logs configuration changes.
  3. Check that there is any rule to alert when the security policy changes.
  4. Check that there is any rule to alert when the recommended configuration changes.
  5. Check that there is any rule to notify when activity alerts changes.
  6. Check if these rules are enabled.
